title: Does Taco Bell offer meat that is "good but edible "?
subtitle: There is a rumor that prisons, school cafeteria, Taco Bell, and other fast food restaurants provide "Grade D but edible" meat.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Prisons, school cafeteria, Taco Bell, and other fast food restaurants use meat "Grade D but edible" in the food products they serve.
